summary: This is a Law360 newsletter from September 14, 2021, covering various legal news stories. The only direct mention of the Epstein case is a brief update on Prince Andrew preparing to fight a lawsuit brought by a Jeffrey Epstein accuser, alleging sexual abuse.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The U.K. royal is mentioned as preparing to fight a lawsuit brought by a Jeffrey Epstein accuser who alleges he sexually abused her.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the central figure in a sex abuse case, with an accuser bringing a lawsuit against Prince Andrew.

persons.name: Ramesh "Sunny" Balwani
persons.context: His request for reserved seats for his attorneys to watch Elizabeth Holmes' trial was denied by a federal judge.

persons.name: Elizabeth Holmes
persons.context: Her criminal fraud trial is mentioned in the context of a denied request by Ramesh Balwani's counsel.

persons.name: Thomas V. Girardi
persons.context: Mentioned in relation to a Ninth Circuit case about Pop Warner concussion protocols that he initially filed.

persons.name: Monica V. Bhattacharyya
persons.context: Hired by the U.S. International Trade Commission, praised for her IP and ITC background.

persons.name: Stephen Breyer
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Justice Barrett trying to convince the public the Supreme Court is not partisan ahead of a major term.

persons.name: Amy Coney Barrett
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Justice Breyer trying to convince the public the Supreme Court is not partisan ahead of a major term.

persons.name: Jerald Howe
persons.context: Authored an expert analysis piece on embracing ESG and social responsibility.

connections.description: Prince Andrew is fighting a lawsuit brought by a Jeffrey Epstein accuser, connecting him to Epstein's circle.
Both are former Theranos executives facing related legal proceedings.

events.title: First Varsity Blues Trial Opens
events.description: The first trial in the 'Varsity Blues' college admissions case kicked off in a Boston federal courtroom with dueling accounts about payments by parents.

events.title: Balwani's Seat Request Denied
events.description: A California federal judge denied ex-Theranos executive Ramesh Balwani's request for reserved seats for his attorneys to watch Elizabeth Holmes' trial.

events.title: Arizona Jury Clears Southwest
events.description: An Arizona federal jury decided Southwest Airlines did not discriminate against a female former field instructor.

events.title: Prince Andrew Prepares Legal Fight
events.description: Prince Andrew is preparing to fight the service of a lawsuit brought by a Jeffrey Epstein accuser alleging sexual abuse.

keyFacts: The document is a Law360 legal news newsletter from September 14, 2021.
It contains a brief update on Prince Andrew preparing to fight a lawsuit brought by a Jeffrey Epstein accuser alleging sexual abuse.
The newsletter covers multiple unrelated legal stories including the Varsity Blues trial, Theranos cases, and employment law matters.
No new substantive details about the Epstein case or the specific allegations against Prince Andrew are provided in this excerpt.
